snippet: Tesla Motors reported a loss in the first quarter as it accelerated the development of its new crossover vehicle and made improvements to its sedan.
abstract: Tesla Motors reports that it lost $49.8 million in the first quarter as the electric carmaker accelerated the development of its new crossover vehicle and made improvements to its Model S sedan.
lead_paragraph: Tesla Motors reported a loss in the first quarter as it accelerated the development of its new crossover vehicle and made improvements to its sedan.

headline.main: Tesla Loses $49.8 Million; Higher Costs Are Blamed
headline.print_headline: Tesla Loses $49.8. Million; Higher Costs Are Blamed
